version_description: This release contains a fix for an issue that caused some users to crash on launch.

You can now:

- Edit and delete comments.
- Enable color blind mode labels (uses patterns and color).
- Mark due dates as complete.

See you in 2017!

THE COMING TO OUR SENSES RELEASE

You can now:

- Edit and delete comments.
- Enable color blind mode labels (uses patterns and color).

Welcome to Trello on iOS 12!
Rest assured, we are making your life easier.

Speak up with Siri Shortcuts:
Open Trello boards and cards using a Siri phrase. Set your own custom phrase on Siri to open specific cards or boards you created.

Add items from outside of the Trello app (like photos, links, and more!) directly to Trello, and they’ll appear instantaneously. Think of all the time you’ll save and treat yourself to another amazing puppy video you found on the internet. You deserve it

Make life (even at work) more delightful from the comfort of your Lock screen, by answering comments with 5 emoji reactions: thumbs-up, thumbs-down, heart, smiling face, and sad face… Now it's just up to you to pick the perfect fit for your feelings.

Welcome Back!
Easily pick up where you left off in the app. When returning to the app, you'll be taken back to the board or card you were viewing last time you quit the app.

We are moving to a new version numbering scheme. The year, followed by number counting the number of releases that year. This version, 2019.7. is the 7th version of Trello iOS released in 2019. Enjoy!

Card templates are now available on mobile!
